overview: Barbara Dare. She's Debbie, the world's most desirable girl. No doubt few would argue with that, but now we've got the proof. You see, Debbie's entered a contest to select "The World's Most Desired", and she won. Hands down. In fact, hands everywhere! And more!  Because to win this title, she had to prove she could earn it. So she did everything and anything they asked her to; every indescribable act no matter how kinky or unusual. She did 'em all. Not only did she do it - she loved it. That's why she won: that's why she is "The World's Most Desirable". She does it all!
title: Debbie Does 'em All 3
